name: Damian Franciszek Pospiech
profile_summary:
Senior Webflow Engineer with 13+ years of experience delivering high-performance applications, specializing in **Webflow**, responsive design, SEO, and site integrations. Proficient in **Figma** for design collaboration and skilled in creating seamless user experiences with **microinteractions** and animations. Experienced in analytics to drive site performance and user engagement. 
Backed by a strong foundation in full stack development with expertise in **JavaScript/TypeScript**, **Python**, and **Flutter**, utilizing frameworks such as **React**, **Next.js**, **Vue**, **Node.js**, **FastAPI**, and **Django**. Knowledgeable in building modern, responsive applications with a focus on delivering quality solutions aligned with industry standards. Demonstrated ability to manage complex projects in compliance with standards such as HIPAA and PCI DSS, while fostering strong communication skills in English.

Collaborated with cross-functional teams to integrate analytics tools for monitoring user behavior and site performance, driving data-informed decisions for continuous improvement.
Utilized **Figma** to create wireframes and interactive prototypes, facilitating effective communication of design concepts and iterative feedback from stakeholders.
